# Executive summary

This report contains 1920 tables from the YouthREX Ontario census data. It is ordered by sub-category.

```{r, results = 'asis'}
library(DT)
# table_list <- lapply(split(iris, iris[, 5]), prettify)
# titles <- names(table_list)

# Generate a list of tables
already_done <- c()
table_list <- list()
titles <- c()
scs <- sort(unique(census_dict$sub_category))
scs <- scs[!scs %in% c('demographic', 'year')]
ages <- sexes <- pobs <- vms <- ais <- geo_codes <- percents <- c(TRUE, FALSE)
years <- c(2001, 2006, 2011)
counter <- 0
for(sc in scs){
  for(age in ages){
    for(sex in sexes){
      for(pob in pobs){
        for(vm in vms){
          for(ai in ais){
            for(geo_code in geo_codes){
              for(percent in percents){
                counter <- counter + 1
                nothing <- !age & !sex & !pob & !vm & !ai & !geo_code
                title <- paste0('Raw ', gsub('_', ' ', sc),
                                ' data',
                                ifelse(nothing, '', ' by '),
                                ifelse(sex, 'sex, ', ''),
                                ifelse(pob, 'place of birth, ', ''),
                                ifelse(vm, 'visible minority status, ', ''),
                                ifelse(ai, 'aboriginal identity, ', ''),
                                ifelse(geo_code, 'geography, ', ''))
                if(substr(title, nchar(title) - 1, nchar(title)) == ', '){
                  title <- substr(title, 1, nchar(title) - 2)
                }
                title <- paste0(title,
                                ifelse(percent, ' (%)', ''))
                titles[counter] <- title
                table_list[[counter]] <-
                  prettify(censify(age = age,
                          sex = sex,
                          pob = pob,
                          vm = vm,
                          ai = ai,
                          geo_code = geo_code,
                          years = c(2001, 2006, 2011),
                          sc = sc,
                          percent = percent),
                          download_options = TRUE)
                # message(counter)
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```{r}
chunks <- paste0('\n## ',
                 titles, 
                 "\n\n```{r}\n", 
                 paste0('table_list[[',
                        1:length(table_list),
                        ']]'), 
                 "\n```\n\n")

file_connection <- file('children.Rmd')
writeLines(paste0('---\noutput: html_document\n---\n\n', 
                  chunks), 
           file_connection)
close(file_connection)
```
